title: Retro State Fairs
description: State fair traditions, rides, and attractions

questions.question: Which state fair, held annually since 1886, is the largest state fair in the United States by attendance?

What fluffy, colorful spun sugar treat is a must-have at any state fair?
What type of livestock competition, where animals are judged on breed standards, has been a state fair tradition since the 1800s?
